00019 #ifndef _L4UTIL_PORT_IO_H
00020 #define _L4UTIL_PORT_IO_H
00021 
00027 /* L4 includes */
00028 #include <l4/sys/l4int.h>
00029 #include <l4/sys/compiler.h>
00030 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00031 
00032 /*****************************************************************************
00033  *** Prototypes
00034  *****************************************************************************/
00035 
00036 EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00047 L4_INLINE l4_uint8_t
00048 l4util_in8(l4_uint16_t port);
00049 
00056 L4_INLINE l4_uint16_t
00057 l4util_in16(l4_uint16_t port);
00058 
00065 L4_INLINE l4_uint32_t
00066 l4util_in32(l4_uint16_t port);
00067 
00076 L4_INLINE void
00077 l4util_ins8(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count);
00078 
00087 L4_INLINE void
00088 l4util_ins16(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count);
00089 
00098 L4_INLINE void
00099 l4util_ins32(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count);
00100 
00107 L4_INLINE void
00108 l4util_out8(l4_uint8_t value, l4_uint16_t port);
00109 
00117 L4_INLINE void
00118 l4util_out16(l4_uint16_t value, l4_uint16_t port);
00119 
00126 L4_INLINE void
00127 l4util_out32(l4_uint32_t value, l4_uint16_t port);
00128 
00132 L4_INLINE void
00133 l4util_iodelay(void);

00139 
00140 /*****************************************************************************
00141  *** Implementation
00142  *****************************************************************************/
00143 
00144 L4_INLINE l4_uint8_t
00145 l4util_in8(l4_uint16_t port)
00146 {
00147   l4_uint8_t value;
00148   asm volatile ("inb %w1, %b0" : "=a" (value) : "Nd" (port));
00149   return value;
00150 }
00151 
00152 L4_INLINE l4_uint16_t
00153 l4util_in16(l4_uint16_t port)
00154 {
00155   l4_uint16_t value;
00156   asm volatile ("inw %w1, %w0" : "=a" (value) : "Nd" (port));
00157   return value;
00158 }
00159 
00160 L4_INLINE l4_uint32_t
00161 l4util_in32(l4_uint16_t port)
00162 {
00163   l4_uint32_t value;
00164   asm volatile ("inl %w1, %0" : "=a" (value) : "Nd" (port));
00165   return value;
00166 }
00167 
00168 L4_INLINE void
00169 l4util_ins8(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count)
00170 {
00171   l4_umword_t dummy1, dummy2;
00172   asm volatile ("rep insb" : "=D"(dummy1), "=c"(dummy2)
00173          : "d" (port), "D" (addr), "c"(count)
00174          : "memory");
00175 }
00176 
00177 L4_INLINE void
00178 l4util_ins16(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count)
00179 {
00180   l4_umword_t dummy1, dummy2;
00181   asm volatile ("rep insw" : "=D"(dummy1), "=c"(dummy2)
00182          : "d" (port), "D" (addr), "c"(count)
00183          : "memory");
00184 }
00185 
00186 L4_INLINE void
00187 l4util_ins32(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count)
00188 {
00189   l4_umword_t dummy1, dummy2;
00190   asm volatile ("rep insl" : "=D"(dummy1), "=c"(dummy2)
00191          : "d" (port), "D" (addr), "c"(count)
00192          : "memory");
00193 }
00194 
00195 L4_INLINE void
00196 l4util_out8(l4_uint8_t value, l4_uint16_t port)
00197 {
00198   asm volatile ("outb %b0, %w1" : : "a" (value), "Nd" (port));
00199 }
00200 
00201 L4_INLINE void
00202 l4util_out16(l4_uint16_t value, l4_uint16_t port)
00203 {
00204   asm volatile ("outw %w0, %w1" : : "a" (value), "Nd" (port));
00205 }
00206 
00207 L4_INLINE void
00208 l4util_out32(l4_uint32_t value, l4_uint16_t port)
00209 {
00210   asm volatile ("outl %0, %w1" : : "a" (value), "Nd" (port));
00211 }
00212 
00213 L4_INLINE void
00214 l4util_iodelay(void)
00215 {
00216   asm volatile ("outb %al,$0x80");
00217 }
00218 
00219 #endif
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
